title: A UAW Faction is Seeking To Oust President Shawn Fain
description: According to a new Bloomberg report, a fringe group of members of the United Auto Workers (UAW), the largest automotive labor union, is seeking to remove its president, Shawn Fain, just two years after the union secured landmark contracts with US automakers and ahead of an election next year.
